name: 第3のダンジョン The Sorrow
name_original: 第3のダンジョン The Sorrow
description:
第3のダンジョン The sorrow

An early prototype for the parody fangame featuring Sakura Miko and the villainous Usada Pekora in... 3rd Dungeon The Sorrow!

Controls
  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • S - Crouch
  • J - Attack
  • K - Jump
Links

  • Usada Pekora - Main Villain - Youtube - Twitter
